scripts.init: git submodule init && git submodule update && npm install && cd dashboard && npm install && cd functions && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --names website,firebase "npm run next-dev" "cd dashboard && npm run emulators"
scripts.build: npm run handle-config && next build && next export -o build
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-rewrites && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-all: cd dashboard && npm run deploy-all && cd .. && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-rewrites: if [ ! -d build ]; then mkdir build && firebase deploy --only hosting; fi
scripts.next-dev: npm run handle-config && NODE_ENV='development' node server.js
